search_results.snippet:
Love is a 2006 theatrical production by Cirque du Soleil which combines the re-
produced and re-imagined music of the Beatles with an interpretive, circus-based 
artistic and athletic stage performance. The show plays at a specially built theatre 
at the Mirage in Las Vegas. ... The LOVE theatre features 24 digital projectors that 
are used in the show.
